name: Delivery Driver Alpha v1.0
description:
wasd controls. If you run out of gas click G to buy some remotely. large triangle in minimap is where you pickup a package, white box is where you deliver it denoted in minimap by green icons. White capsule place gets you more gas, black square repairs broken car, gold triangle upgrades health on car - all cost money. The goal of this is to tell me what I can do to make it more fun! :)


This is a small video game meant to eventually show the discontent that uber eats drivers face when picking up packages to deliver to customers, and then turn into a tycoon like fashion where you begin to upgrade your car, its health, and start taking care of more important deliveries.
